I talk about this method:
http://junit.sourceforge.net/javadoc/junit/framew=
ork/TestCase.html#getName()

The getName() method is specific to JUnit 3, i=
t doesn't appear on
Object class:
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/j=
ava/lang/Object.html

As I said, with JUnit4 you don't need to inherit any =
class... So how
to replace a call to getName() method?

Regards,
Anthony
